description: Create, Delete and Modify Pools on Infinibox

state.description: Creates/Modifies Pool when present or removes when absent

user.description: Infinibox User username with sufficient priveledges ( see notes ).

vsize.description: Pool Virtual Capacity in MB, GB or TB units. If pool vsize is not set on pool creation, Virtual Capacity will be equal to Physical Capacity. See examples.

size.description: Pool Physical Capacity in MB, GB or TB units. If pool size is not set on pool creation, size will be equal to 1TB. See examples.
